snippet: One of the most effective critics from within the Catholic Church spoke out early about the sexual abuse of children.
abstract: Editorial memorializes Rev Andrew Greeley, praising him for sounding prophetic warning in the mid-1980's and early 1990s concerning sexual abuse of children in the Catholic Church;
lead_paragraph: One of the most effective critics from within the Catholic Church spoke out early about the sexual abuse of children.

headline.seo: Father Andrew Greeley, Defender of the Faithful
headline.main: Father Greeley, Defender of the Faithful
headline.print_headline: Father Greeley, Defender of the Faithful
